column4: hey. I'm just trying to restore my /home directory from my last fullbackup. I'm using sbackup. Now sbackup started recovering and copied all the files from the backup-archive, but somehow it doesn't write them to /home/username. instead it created a directory /home/tmpTw6tDZ/ where it seems to store the data. WTF?
no, just don't appreciate the band language, please try not o use it
